result.arabic_text: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ
result.translation: Mola wetu! Unighufirie mimi na wazazi wangu wote wawili, na Waumini, siku ya kusimama hisabu.
result.footnotes: Ewe Mola wetu Mlezi! Nisamehe madhambi yaliyo niponyoka, na wasamehe wazazi wangu, na Waumini wote, Siku itapo hakikishwa hisabu, na baadae ikawa malipo.
